summary: This is an email from the Associate Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 10, 2019, transmitting the daily assignments for two staff members, Tova Noel and Michael Thomas. The document is significant as it originates from the federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held and died on August 10, 2019.

locations.context: The federal detention facility from which the email originates; the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, the same day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.
The email transmits daily assignments for two MCC New York staff members: Tova Noel and Michael Thomas.
The document originates from the office of the Associate Warden at MCC New York, indicating routine prison administrative activity on the day of Epstein's death.
